channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sopranos-style bath tub murder cold case reopened by police 35 years on with help of key tool
item.description: Richard 'Ricky' Haywood was executed in 1989 at point-blank range while shaving in the tub - nobody has ever faced justice for the cold-blooded murder...

item.title: People have some questions about ‘188-year-old man found living in a cave’
item.description: A video of the frail-looking man has gone viral.

item.title: Man who made album in tribute to wife with top orchestra returns with new music
item.description: Mr Studer said he looked after his wife for 15 years while she lived with neuropathy, a condition affecting the nerves in the body’s extremities inclu...

item.title: Taxidermist turns rats into ‘sexy showgirls’ with nipple covers and fake eyelashes
item.description: 'When people come up to me they gasp or they clutch their pearls when they see what I have made and they get really excited, I love it so much.'

item.title: 'I made my own version of the viral Anthropologie festive garland and saved £70'

item.title: Woman finds entire potato in ‘damp’ bag of Greggs crisps
item.description: Despite it causing the office to be in hysterics, the smell and dampness of the bag was rather concerning.

item.title: These five vegetables can 'survive winter' and 'grow themselves'
